data-loader-description: Load tabular data from multiple file formats (CSV, Excel, JSON)
data-loader-data-table: Loaded data with columns, rows, and inferred schema
data-loader-preview-html: HTML preview of the data table
nl-to-sql-description: Transform natural language instructions into SQL queries and execute them
nl-to-sql-instruction: Natural language instruction (e.g., 'Show top 10 sales by region')
nl-to-sql-result-table: Query execution result as a data table
chart-generator-description: Generate interactive charts using Vega-Lite specifications
chart-generator-size-field: Optional field for size encoding (scatter plots)
chart-generator-chart-image: Base64 encoded PNG image of the chart
data-extractor-description: Extract structured tabular data from images, text, or HTML using AI
data-extractor-source-type: Type of data source to extract from
data-extractor-source-content: Source content (image path/URL, raw text, or HTML)
data-extractor-extraction-confidence: Confidence score (0-1) of the extraction quality
nl-to-pandas-description: Transform data using natural language instructions converted to Python Pandas code
nl-to-pandas-instruction: Natural language instruction (e.g., 'Add a column showing percent change')
nl-to-pandas-result-table: Transformation result as a data table
chart-recommender-description: Intelligently recommend the best chart types based on data characteristics
chart-recommender-analysis-goal: Optional: Your analysis intent or question to explore
